name: Bonnier Broadcasting AB
goal: Bonnier Broadcasting is a Nordic based broadcasting group comprising the major Swedish and Finnish commercial broadcasters TV4, MTV and Cmore and news producers Nyhetsbolaget and MediaHub. Our ambition is to bring the best Nordic content to the consumers via the most up to date technology and solid and sustainable financial solutions, fully apt for the modern digital world.
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, Audiovisual Media Regulation, Copyright legislation
